text: Arlington Memorial Amphitheater is an amphitheater in Arlington National Cemetery. It was built in 1921 to replace an old amphitheater. The amphitheater is next to the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier. == Other websites == * the Memorial Amphitheater in the Arlington National Cemetery Web site Amphitheater Category:1921 establishments in the United States
title: Arlington Memorial Amphitheater
